DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study demonstrate lubricity DAILIES TOTAL1® ( DT1 ) lenses 16 hour wear equivalent lubricity unworn DT1 lens .
DOC.detailed_description: In study , participant wear study lenses 2 specified time period ( 16 hour 15 minute , treatment sequence randomize ) follow lens collect ex vivo lubricity analysis . The ex vivo lubricity analysis evaluate separate non-clinical protocol .
DOC.criteria: Willing able sign Informed Consent document . Adapted , current soft contact lens wearer . Requires contact lens power within specify range 0.50 diopter ( D ) 10.00D . Cylinder 0.00D 1.00D ( inclusive ) eye Visit 1 manifest refraction . Vision correctable 20/25 good eye distance study lens . Willing wear study lenses least 16 waking hour one day attend study visit . Able successfully fit study lens . Other protocolspecified inclusion criterion may apply . Any ocular infection , inflammation , abnormality active disease would contraindicate contact lens wear , determine Investigator . Use systemic ocular medication contact lens wear could contraindicate , determine Investigator . Use artificial tear rewetting drop study . Monocular ( one eye functional vision ) fit one lens .
